pageContext.collection_description: Contains scripts of Spotlight Playhouse, 1946, The Eddy King Show, 1947-1948, Ready for Brady, 1948-1949, The Monty Masters Show, 1948-1949, and Candy Matson, 1949-1951. In addition to these series, the collection contains story treatments and sample scripts for proposed television and radio series from the early 1950s as well as single copies of scripts from various radio programs.
